lyrics:
47 contributorstranslationsfrançaisdon’t forget me lyricsverse 1
im an ocean in your bedroom
make you feel warm make you wanna resume
now we know it all for sure

verse 2
im a dance hall dirty breakbeat
make the snow fall up from underneath your feet
not alone ill be there tell me when you want to go

guitar solo 1

verse 3
im a meth lab first rehab
take it all off and step inside the running cab
theres a love that knows the way

verse 4
im the rainbow in your jail cell
all the memories of everything youve ever smelled
not alone ill be there tell me when you want to go

chorus
so
sideways fallin more will be revealed my friend
sideways fallin
dont forget me i cant hide it
more will be revealed my friend
come again get me excited
see red hot chili peppers liveget tickets as low as 75you might also likeguitar solo 2

verse 5
im an inbred and a pothead
two legs that you spread inside the tool shed
now we know it all for sure

verse 6
i could show you to the free field
overcome and more will always be revealed
not alone ill be there tell me when you wanna go

chorus
so
sideways fallin more will be revealed my friend
sideways fallin
dont forget me i cant hide it
more will be revealed my friend
come again make me excited
ohoh
sideways fallin more will be revealed my friend
sideways fallin
dont forget me i cant hide it
more will be revealed my friend
theres a match now let me light it
guitar solo 3

verse 7
im the bloodstain on your shirt sleeve
comin down and more are comin to believe
now we know it all for sure

verse 8
make the hair stand up on your arm
teach you how to dance inside the funny farm
not alone ill be there tell me when you wanna go

outro
ill be there but tell me when you wanna go
come again and tell me when you wanna go
more will be revealed my friend15embed
